users.name: Thor
users.description: The son of Odin uses his abilities as the God of Thunder to protect Asgard and planet Earth alike.

users.name: Iron Man
users.description: Tony Stark, best known by his superhero persona Iron Man.

users.name: Superman
users.description: Clark Joseph Kent, best known by his superhero persona Superman.

users.name: Batman
users.description: Bruce Wayne, best known by his superhero persona Batman.

users.name: Spider-Man
users.description: American teenager Peter Parker, a poor sickly orphan, is bitten by a radioactive spider. As a result of the bite, he gains superhuman strength, speed, and agility, along with the ability to cling to walls, turning him into Spider-Man.
